info.title: INNO-API :: T.R innovation API and pre production for RIS-API
info.description:
T.R Reisendeninformationen innovation API and pre production for RIS-API.

For details on INNO-API: https://ri-wiki.com/x/CrHDAw

For details on RIS-API: https://ri-wiki.com/x/q6GsBQ

Getting started:
Use code generation with openapi-generator for the language of your desire.
for Java 11: java -jar openapi-generator-cli-4.1.3.jar generate -g java -i swagger.yml --library native --api-package %TBD% --invoker-package %TBD% --model-package %TBD%

get.description: Returns a journey [Fahrtverlauf] with all its segments [Fahrtabschnitte], arrivals [Ankuenfte] and departures [Abfahrten] for the requested id. Segment based [Fahrtabschnittsbasiert] view.

parameters.name: includeJourneyReferences
parameters.description: include journey references like relief [Entlastung], replace [Ersatz], continuation [Durchbindung], travelswith [Vereinigung / Fluegelung]

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

get.description: Finds journey [Fahrt] departure [Abfahrt] by provided relation criterias [Fahrtrelation].

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: date (yyyy-MM-dd) of scheduled start of journey [Verkehrstag]

parameters.name: evaNumber
parameters.description: departure station id [Haltestelle ID] for desired departure

parameters.name: timeSchedule
parameters.description: scheduled departure time [Geplante Abfahrtszeit] for desired departure as full qualified datetime (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ)

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

get.description: Finds journeys [Fahrten] by provided relation criterias [Fahrtrelation] (max of 100 matches are returned).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: date (yyyy-MM-dd) of scheduled start of journey [Verkehrstag], if omitted defaults to today

parameters.name: transports
parameters.description: transport types that should be returned, if ommitted all types of transport are returned

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

get.description: Finds journey [Fahrt] arrival [Ankunft] by provided relation criterias [Fahrtrelation].

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: date (yyyy-MM-dd) of scheduled start of journey [Verkehrstag]

parameters.name: evaNumber
parameters.description: arrival station id [Haltestelle ID] for desired departure

parameters.name: timeSchedule
parameters.description: scheduled arrival time [Geplante Ankunftszeit] for desired arrival as full qualified datetime (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ)

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

field.description: Name of field / element that raised the error.

ErrorDetail.description: Detailed error information on field level.

instanceId.description: Unique identifier for instance that raised the error.

errors.description: List of detailed errors in case multiple errors have lead to the surrounding error.

ErrorResponse.description: API error object conforming to RFC7807.

Administration.description: Information on the operator [Betreiber] and the administration [Verwaltung] of the journey.

passengerChange.description: Indicates whether passengers are allowed to enter / leave [Fahrgastwechsel].

timeSchedule.description: Scheduled time [Soll] of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

time.description: Best known time information of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

platformSchedule.description: Scheduled platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

platform.description: Actual platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

messages.description: List of messages [Freitexte] for journey at this particular stop [Freitexte].

disruptions.description: List of disruptions [Stoerungsinformationen] for journey at this particular stop.

passengerChange.description: Indicates whether passengers are allowed to enter / leave [Fahrgastwechsel].

timeSchedule.description: Scheduled time [Soll] of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

time.description: Best known time information of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

platformSchedule.description: Scheduled platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

platform.description: Actual platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

messages.description: List of messages [Freitexte] for journey at this particular stop [Freitexte].

disruptions.description: List of disruptions [Stoerungsinformationen] for journey at this particular stop.

textShort.description: Optional short text of disruption communication.

displayPriority.description: Display priority [Anzeigereihenfolge] for disruption. Order is by display priority asc. May be empty.

descriptions.description: Textual short description of disruption by language identifier.

journeyCanceled.description: Flag that indicates whether whole journey has been canceled.

disruptions.description: List of disruptions [Stoerungsinformationen] for whole journey.

JourneySegmentBased.description: Segment based [Fahrtabschnittsbasiert] information for a particular journey [Fahrtverlauf].

code.description: Unique code of message may be empty in case of HIM based messages.

displayPriority.description: Display priority [Anzeigereihenfolge] for message. Order is by display priority asc. May be empty.

category.description: Optional category of message, like for instance 'Bauarbeiten' or 'Informationen'

textShort.description: Short freetext of message, may be empty.

Message.description: Message for customers and or employees, depends on type.

MessageType.description:
Classification of message.
- CUSTOMER_TEXT (?)
- QUALITY_VARIATION (?)
- CUSTOMER_REASON (?)

additional.description: Indicates whether this segment is additional, meaning not be part of the regular schedule.

canceled.description: Indicates whether this segment has been canceled.

reliefFor.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment reliefs for [Entlastungszug].

reliefBy.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment is reliefed by [Entlastungszug].

replacementFor.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment replaces [Ersatzzug].

replacedBy.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment is replaced by [Ersatzzug].

travelsWith.description: List of journeys this journey at this particular segment travels with [Traktionen].

Segment.description: Journey segment information on departure and arrival [Fahrtabschnitt].

additional.description: Indicates whether this segment is additional, meaning not be part of the regular schedule.

canceled.description: Indicates whether this segment has been canceled.

reliefFor.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment reliefs for [Entlastungszug].

reliefBy.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment is reliefed by [Entlastungszug].

replacementFor.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment replaces [Ersatzzug].

replacedBy.description: List of transports this journey at this particular segment is replaced by [Ersatzzug].

travelsWith.description: List of journeys this journey at this particular segment travels with [Traktionen].

scheduledBeforeDepartureID.description: References to departure ID this segment was positioned before. May reference to a canceled segment as well and may be empty in case of destination.

name.description: Name for station in fixed language.
Name for station in fixed language.

canceled.description: Indicates whether the stop ie departure / arrival has been canceled [Haltausfall].

StopAtStation.description: Stop at a particular station [Bahnhof] for arrival / departure boards.

TimeType.description:
Specifies whether 'time' is based on schedule or preview.
- SCHEDULE (Time source is schedule)
- PREVIEW (Time source is preview / forecast)
- REAL (Time source is real)

label.description: Marketing - or product name of the transport, for instance 'Sprinter' or 'Schwarzwaldexpress' etc. [Marketing Name / Produkt Name].

TransportPublic.description: Public transport description for all types of trains, buses, subways, trams etc.

label.description: Marketing - or product name of the transport, for instance 'Sprinter' or 'Schwarzwaldexpress' etc. [Marketing Name / Produkt Name].

TransportPublicDestination.description: Public transport [Oeffentlicher Transport] with (scheduled) destination [Ziel] and differing destination in case the final stop of the journey changed [Haltausfall, Laufwegverl√§ngerung, ...].

label.description: Marketing - or product name of the transport, for instance 'Sprinter' or 'Schwarzwaldexpress' etc. [Marketing Name / Produkt Name].

TransportType.description:
Type of transport.
- HIGH_SPEED_TRAIN (High speed train [Hochgeschwindigkeitszug] like ICE or TGV etc.)
- INTERCITY_TRAIN (Inter city train [Intercityzug])
- INTER_REGIONAL_TRAIN (Inter regional train [Interregiozug])
- REGIONAL_TRAIN (Regional train [Regionalzug])
- CITY_TRAIN (City train [S-Bahn])
- SUBWAY (Subway [U-Bahn])
- TRAM (Tram [Strassenbahn])
- BUS (Bus [Bus])
- FERRY (Ferry [Faehre])
- FLIGHT (Flight [Flugzeug])
- CAR (Car [Auto])
- TAXI (Taxi)
- SHUTTLE (Shuttle [Ruftaxi])
- BIKE ((E-)Bike [Fahrrad])
- SCOOTER ((E-)Scooter [Roller])
- WALK (Walk ([Laufen])
- UNKNOWN (Unknown)

timeSchedule.description: Scheduled time [Soll] of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

time.description: Best known time information of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

platformSchedule.description: Scheduled platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

platform.description: Actual platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

date.description: Date of scheduled start departure of journey [Verkehrstag].

timeSchedule.description: Scheduled time [Soll] of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

time.description: Best known time information of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

platformSchedule.description: Scheduled platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

platform.description: Actual platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.
